about_the_game:
Jans Token Pack 01 - Desert Warriors

Desert Warriors.
30 tokens, both male and female for use in your desert environments.
This product includes:
  • Female Axe
  • Female Bow
  • Female Blow Leather Armor
  • Female Burning Hands Mage
  • Female Crossbow Leather Armor
  • Female Dagger
  • Female Mace Shield Scale Mail
  • Female Spear
  • Female Staff
  • Female Sword Shield
  • Female Sword Shield Chainmail
  • Female Two Handed Sword Plate Armor
  • Female Two Swords
  • Female Two Swords Chainmail
  • Male Axe
  • Male Bow
  • Male Bow Leather Armor
  • Male Burning Hands Mage
  • Male Crossbow Leather Armor
  • Male Dagger
  • Male Fireball Mage
  • Male Lightningbolt Mage
  • Male Mace Shield Scale Mail
  • Male Spear
  • Male Staff
  • Male Sword Shield
  • Male Sword Shield Chainmail
  • Male Two Handed Sword Plate Armor
  • Male Two Swords
  • Male Two Swords Chainmail
Converted by:   Jan Loos

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
